name: Super Fox Run
description:
As the name suggests, this is just an attempt for me to recreate some, if not all, of the features in our beloved retro game Super Mario Bros. So playing this may give some nostalgia, at least with the gameplay feel of it hehe.

PS: Only created a tutorial section and at least 3 levels. But so far, I can say this is my first 'complete' game in a sense haha. 

Opening the game

Unzip the downloaded files and:

  • Windows - Open the unzipped folder and then open the "Super Fox Run.exe"
  • MacOS - Open the unzipped folde and then open the only file in there.
  • Linux - Open the unzipped folder and then open the "Super_Fox _Run_v1_linux.86_64" file
Credits

Most assests used in this game are made by the following people. Please do follow them for more of their works:

  • Ansimuz: (For Characters, items, backgrounds and environment sprites)

    • Asset Page
  • littlerobotsoundfactory: (For in-game sound effects)

    • Asset Page
  • Baris Yaman: (For in-game music)
    • Link: https://soundcloud.com/barisyaman
    • Asset Page
  • Jakub Varga: (For all UI and fonts)
    • Link: https://kobliznik.artstation.com/projects
    • Asset Page
